description.text: The function getFreeMemory can be used to get the amount of the currently free memory.
Die Funktion getFreeMemory kann verwendet werden, um die Menge des aktuell freien Speichers zu ermitteln.

If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality solely to authenticated users, the function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer authentifiziert. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authenticated THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthenticated EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality to certain roles, the function SHALL check in the corresponding role if the (unauthenticated) user is authorized to execute the function. If the user is not authorized, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer berechtigt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authorized THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthorized EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT autorisiert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthorized BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: The function SHALL determine the amount of the currently free memory. If the determination of the amount of the currently free memory fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorGetFreeMemoryFailed and exit the function.
Ermittelt freien Speicher. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorGetFreeMemoryFailed, Ende.

pseudocode.text: TRY DETERMINE free memory amount CATCH error THROW ErrorGetFreeMemoryFailed EXIT function END
VERSUCHE ERMITTLE Menge des aktuell freien Speichers BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorGetFreeMemoryFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

trigger.text: The determination of the free memory fails
Die Ermittlung des freien Speichers schlägt fehl

description.text: If the determination of the amount of the currently free memory has been successful, the function SHALL return the amount of the currently free memory by usage of the output parameter freeMemory. Additionally, the function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function getFreeMemory has been successful.
Gibt freien Speicher zurück. Bei Erfolg keine Exception.

pseudocode.text: GEBE Menge freien Speichers zurück (freeMemory Parameter) RETURN ohne Exception

condition.text: The determination of the free memory amount has been successful
Die Ermittlung der Menge des aktuell freien Speichers war erfolgreich

action.text: Return the free memory amount without raising an exception
Gibt Speichermenge zurück und kehrt ohne Exception zurück

description.text: the free memory of the storage medium in bytes.
der freie Speicher des Speichermediums in Bytes.
